page.title: 03DAY IN THE LIFE OF S.PREACE
page.content: Beep-beep. My digital watch sounds the alarm. I get ready for school. Downstairs I listen to the radio whilst having my cereals and examine the free gift from the packet. Before I go to school I watch some television and page{'ORICAL'}to see what's on later. I go off to school and arrive just before the bell. In Maths I use a calculator for some of the sums, because they are hard. At dinner time I go home for my dinner, which is cooked in the{Microwave.}Back to school where I get ready for some more boring lessons. After school I go home and watch more television.Then I'll have my tea. Later I'll play on my{computer}or I might get a{Video}or listen to my records. Then I'll go to bed and read for a while.
